data.description:
Vector of data to stack into a matrix.
A Hashmap of matrices will be emitted if multiple rows are provided.

name: reshape

symmetric.description: Set if data are elements from the upper triangle of a symmetric matrix.

layout.description: Consecutive elements of either the `row` or `column` reside next to each other.

shape.description: The shape of the output matrix.

description: Reshapes a row vector into a matrix.
